pullrequest.title: Add 3D Lidar mesh and put it on WAM-V

content.raw:
I have fixed the previous issues by breaking up the `.dae` file into two files. This image shows the fixed model, with correct positioning, collision, intertia, fixed joint and box.

![](data/bitbucket.org/repo/BgXLzgM/images/3576541304-Better_model_from_breaking_up_dae_file.png)
content.html: I have fixed the previous issues by breaking up the .dae file into two files. This image shows the fixed model, with correct positioning, collision, intertia, fixed joint and box.
